attributes.action: To stop Danny Hulme entering or visiting Rossendale.
attributes.additional_details: Sophie, who was 20, was beaten and kicked with her boyfriend by a gang of teenage boys in a park in Bacup in 2007. The pair were targeted because of their goth clothing, piercings and make-up. One of the gang, Danny Hulme, is now out of jail and has been given permission to visit Rossendale.This an out cry after what they did to sophie and her boyfriend its hard enough for her family to cope with this but for the law to say this lad can enter and cause more pain for sophie family
